pageContext.analysis: The report from special counsel Robert Mueller says that Trump's attempts to obstruct justice were unsuccessful in various cases because aides such as Donald McGahn and Corey Lewandowski refused to carry out his orders. Kirstjen Nielsen resigned as Homeland Security secretary because she would not deny entry to asylum-seekers, as Trump wanted. Jim Mattis resigned as defense secretary because he did not support Trump's decision to withdraw U.S. troops from Syria. Jeff Sessions resigned as attorney general after a long campaign by Trump to get him to withdraw his recusal from the Russia investigation. Those are just three big examples.
